name: crafty jumper
description:
jump and hop, in a crafty jumper minecraft world. Endless hopper action.
You will need some crafty jumper skills to get far.
One tap to jump and double tap to jump higher and further.
You will need to work out which jump to use at the right time.
Watch out for the bear, he looks harmless, but he will get you.
Collect mushrooms to use to unlock over 40 jumping characters.
Ride on trains and busses, Avoid water, and objects.
See how many jumps you can do.
Compete on the leaderboard against friends and the world.

Features-
Unlock over 40 cool characters.
LeaderBoard.
Endless platform arcade game.
Simple tapping jumping game.
Lots more updates and levels coming soon.
